verses.verse: <S%H8085>Hear<s%> you the <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>speaks<s%> to you, O <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3925>Learn<s%> not the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen,<s%> and be not <S%H2865>dismayed<s%> at the <S%H226>signs<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven;<s%> for the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> are <S%H2865>dismayed<s%> at them.

For the <S%H2708>customs<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H1892>vain:<s%> for one <S%H3772>cuts<s%> a <S%H6086>tree<s%> out of the <S%H3293>forest,<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H2796>workman,<s%> with the <S%H4621>ax.<s%>
They <S%H3302>deck<s%> it with <S%H3701>silver<s%> and with <S%H2091>gold;<s%> they <S%H2388>fasten<s%> it with <S%H4548>nails<s%> and with <S%H4717>hammers,<s%> that it <S%H6328>move<s%> not.

They are <S%H4749>upright<s%> as the <S%H8560>palm<s%> tree, but <S%H1696>speak<s%> not: they must needs be <S%H5375>borne,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H6805>go.<s%> Be not <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of them; for they <S%H3808>cannot<s%> do <S%H7489>evil,<s%> <S%H1571>neither<s%> <S%H369><s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> is it in them to do <S%H3190>good.<s%>
For as much as there is <S%H369>none<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> to you, O <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> you are <S%H1419>great,<s%> and your <S%H8034>name<s%> is <S%H1419>great<s%> in <S%H1369>might.<s%>

<S%H4310>Who<s%> would not <S%H3372>fear<s%> you, O <S%H4428>King<s%> of <S%H1471>nations?<s%> for to you does it <S%H2969>appertain:<s%> for as much as among <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2450>wise<s%> men of the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and in <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4467>kingdoms,<s%> there is <S%H369>none<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> to you.
But they are <S%H259>altogether<s%> <S%H1197>brutish<s%> and <S%H3688>foolish:<s%> the <S%H6086>stock<s%> is a <S%H4148>doctrine<s%> of <S%H1892>vanities.<s%>

<S%H3701>Silver<s%> <S%H7554>spread<s%> into plates is <S%H935>brought<s%> from <S%H8659>Tarshish,<s%> and <S%H2091>gold<s%> from <S%H210>Uphaz,<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H2796>workman,<s%> and of the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H6884>founder:<s%> <S%H8504>blue<s%> and <S%H713>purple<s%> is their <S%H3830>clothing:<s%> they are <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H2450>cunning<s%> men.

But the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is the <S%H571>true<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> he is the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> and an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H4428>king:<s%> at his <S%H7110>wrath<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H7493>tremble,<s%> and the <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall not be <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H3557>abide<s%> his <S%H2195>indignation.<s%>

<S%H1836>Thus<s%> shall you <S%H560>say<s%> to them, The <S%H426>gods<s%> that have not <S%H5648>made<s%> the <S%H8065>heavens<s%> and the <S%H778>earth,<s%> even they shall <S%H7>perish<s%> from the <S%H772>earth,<s%> and from <S%H8460>under<s%> <S%H429>these<s%> <S%H8065>heavens.<s%>

He has <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> by his <S%H3581>power,<s%> he has <S%H3559>established<s%> the <S%H8398>world<s%> by his <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> and has <S%H5186>stretched<s%> out the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> by his <S%H8394>discretion.<s%>

When he <S%H5414>utters<s%> his <S%H6963>voice,<s%> there is a <S%H1995>multitude<s%> of <S%H4325>waters<s%> in the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and he causes the <S%H5387>vapors<s%> to <S%H5927>ascend<s%> from the <S%H7097>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth;<s%> he <S%H6213>makes<s%> <S%H1300>lightning<s%> with <S%H4306>rain,<s%> and <S%H3318>brings<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> the <S%H7307>wind<s%> out of his <S%H214>treasures.<s%>

<S%H3605>Every<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> is <S%H1197>brutish<s%> in his <S%H1847>knowledge:<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H6884>founder<s%> is <S%H3001>confounded<s%> by the <S%H6459>graven<s%> <S%H6459>image:<s%> for his <S%H5262>molten<s%> image is <S%H8267>falsehood,<s%> and there is <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7307>breath<s%> in them.
They are <S%H1892>vanity,<s%> and the <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H8595>errors:<s%> in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of their <S%H6486>visitation<s%> they shall <S%H6>perish.<s%>

The <S%H2506>portion<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> is not like them: for he is the <S%H3335>former<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> things; and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is the <S%H7626>rod<s%> of his <S%H5159>inheritance:<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> is his <S%H8034>name.<s%>
<S%H622>Gather<s%> up your <S%H3666>wares<s%> out of the <S%H776>land,<s%> O <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of the <S%H4693>fortress.<s%>

For <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H7049>sling<s%> out the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> at <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H6471>once,<s%> and will <S%H6887>distress<s%> them, that they may <S%H4672>find<s%> it so.

<S%H188>Woe<s%> is me for my <S%H7667>hurt!<s%> my <S%H4347>wound<s%> is <S%H2470>grievous;<s%> but I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H389>Truly<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> is a <S%H2483>grief,<s%> and I must <S%H5375>bear<s%> it.

My <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> is <S%H7703>spoiled,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H4340>cords<s%> are <S%H5423>broken:<s%> my <S%H1121>children<s%> are <S%H3318>gone<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> of me, and they are not: there is <S%H369>none<s%> to <S%H5186>stretch<s%> forth my <S%H168>tent<s%> any <S%H5750>more,<s%> and to <S%H6965>set<s%> up my <S%H3407>curtains.<s%>

For the <S%H7462>pastors<s%> are <S%H1197>become<s%> <S%H1197>brutish,<s%> and have not <S%H1875>sought<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> they shall not <S%H7919>prosper,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H4830>flocks<s%> shall be <S%H6327>scattered.<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of the <S%H8052>bruit<s%> is <S%H935>come,<s%> and a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7494>commotion<s%> out of the <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H776>country,<s%> to <S%H7760>make<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H8077>desolate,<s%> and a <S%H4583>den<s%> of <S%H8577>dragons.<s%>
O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> I <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H1870>way<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> is not in himself: it is not in man that <S%H1980>walks<s%> to <S%H3559>direct<s%> his <S%H6806>steps.<s%>
O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3256>correct<s%> me, but with <S%H4941>judgment;<s%> not in your <S%H639>anger,<s%> <S%H6435>lest<s%> you bring me to <S%H4591>nothing.<s%>

<S%H8210>Pour<s%> out your <S%H2534>fury<s%> on the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> that <S%H3045>know<s%> you not, and on the <S%H4940>families<s%> that <S%H7121>call<s%> not on your <S%H8034>name:<s%> for they have <S%H398>eaten<s%> up <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and <S%H398>devoured<s%> him, and <S%H3615>consumed<s%> him, and have <S%H6213>made<s%> his <S%H5116>habitation<s%> <S%H8074>desolate.<s%>
